attributes.title: DONT GET IT IT TOOK ME TO SOME RANDOS BASEMENT!
attributes.review: Hello everyone 👋 , I am writing writing ✍️ while locked 🔐 up in a meat meat 🥩 grinder chamber, immediately after downloading the app I got a message demanding a foot 🦶 picture camera 📸 I said no then it sent my location to the mafia (run by bts and anonymous), the black market and the dark web, they informed them of my location and before I had a 😇chance Harry 🧐styles barged in, he isn’t my type but I was taken aback, after I had a knife 😟😠🤯🤕and hydro flask thrown at me as an an alien began trying to Harass me with its toe, 🦶speaking in many 😡💀foreign😌🧠languages so it could seee what language I spoke, it then dragged me to the chamber where Levi Ackerman, 🤑Naruto uzumaki, 🤤karma akabane, 😳Todoroki, 🥵bakuhoe, 😲jenifer laurances 🤔(goodwill ver of her) 🥶and kageyama 😬stood prepared me to go to the cannibalism 🤤site, of course I accepted and went because... they FIONE, except for the fake knockoff 🙄🥱jenifer laurances, I wanted the real her, then Kim Taehyung appeared out 😧of no where 😐😴😵dragging me to a basement full of others crying 😓😥😭after they had downloaded the app, the government is planning to replace us with people using our identitties,🤯 so I was forced to give my social security and left toe.. I like that toe because when I disabled my eye socket it removed and comfortably sat inside... please send help.. I wouldn’t mind if the anime characters and everyone else was still here but they gone and I am left with -foriganers- who have no limbs and are slowly dying 💖🤪🤩send help I’m next 🙃😊🤯

attributes.title: Wow🥑
attributes.review: I was very Excited because I would be a person who helped America be Great Again. But this App just got Me mad and disappointed! It took an hour to load. I have very good WiFi and connection. It also took FIVE days to log in because it said that I had to wait so they can recognize me. (Was very suspicious) it took for ever to fill the log in page. As another Review said, It asked very Personal questions and I felt like I was being Personally attacked. It made me think America Wasn’t going to be great. It asked what my vacuum looked like because supposedly there could be a very Dangerous thing inside it. Please don’t get it and don’t waste your time

attributes.title: Not worth it
attributes.review: Seriously so glitchy. Not worth the space on your phone! I think it’s screwing with other functions of my phone

attributes.title: Awful, save tiem, done downlode
attributes.review: Unlike all the liberal left wing lazy milleneealls, I am patriotic and love Amerika and have a job. I work at as a Trump fan and make my money by selling trump merch. I would not be where I am without his economic policies that help me and the average american so much. However, this appliance is TERRIBLE. First, it kept saying that I couldn’t download it like I’m pretty sure I tapped the button thank you very much. Then when after laboring over tapping a button for seven straight minutes, it finnalg downlaod but took SEVIN hours!!!!! Hwo?! Then the app fliteched when I opened it. Terrible user friendly ness I hate it. Awful. Do not donwload, it stole my credit card and donated money to Obama!!!!!! 0/10 get it off the App Store!!!!!

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!1!1!!1
attributes.review: so i got this app to be like a true american or whatever, but then i realized it was the all a scam. first of all this app is ran by the chinese government and tried to hijack my phone. It kept telling me to vote for this man named Ronald Dump or whatever. I saw that his 🍆 was really small. Thanks to twitter. He’s basically the leader of a cult with white people who wave guns around since they’re 🐱🐱. but like i was mowing the lawn in my dining room and i kept getting notifications and i thought it was my baby daddy but it was just this dumb app that was blowing up my phone. It made my phone freeze and it lost all my contacts. so now i don’t have the numbers of my baby daddies to pay child support. totally do not recommend this app.

attributes.title: Ewww
attributes.review: Not worth the time this app said everyone who supports him is ugly it also said my grandma is six feet in the ground because she was so ugly 😭I will not recommend EVER it it make me cry WAAaAaAaAAAaaaa😭😭😭😭😭😭😭

attributes.title: I can’t believe it!
attributes.review: As soon as I opened this app I was assaulted with bigoted, narcissistic, misogynistic and narcissistic rhetoric. It was really confusing too because the language was broken and meandering. It was like open mic night at a Proud Boys poetry slam. Then after that madness there was strangeness about nuking hurricanes, vacuuming forests and injecting people with bleach. It took about five minutes for me to realize that there was something seriously wrong with this app. Do yourselves a favor and run away screaming!
